name: Fields Of Gold
description:
The Fields of Gold

Story 

Welcome to The Fields of Gold! You are a small farmer who aspires to be not only the best farmer in the village but also to be known as the most popular person in the village. Please the other locals to gain access to the best crops on your road to become the ultimate farming tycoon! 

Controls

* Move around by holding the middle mouse / scroll wheel 

* Plant crops by clicking on them in the right panel & set them on any free field (no boulder or tree) 

* Excessively use the neighbourhood bonus to harvest more crops! Place the same crops next to each other for the bonus to kick in. 

* Wait for the crops to finish (they do not grow upwards anymore), then click on them to harvest them. You will earn seeds & cash 

* Use dynamite to clear obstacles such as boulders & pine trees 

* Finish missions to get access to more crops!

* Factories need resources to produce, which can be loaded by clicking it.
